author: dreid
msg: This has been on my ToDO list for a while, but essentially I've never
quite got around to changing the locks and so they were still identical
implementations, despite having different purposes :(  So, until I get
the time to add the different impl. I'm simplifying what we had to make
them quicker and easier to maintain.
